params.name: allowed
params.doc: set true to offer product by subscription and for one-time purchase, set false to offer product as subscription only

params.name: assignedSubscriptionOptions
params.doc: ordered array of subscription options that will be assigned to product, if empty all subscription options will be removed from product

params.name: prices
params.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.Original prices to which subscription options discount will be applied.
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price

params.name: ids
params.doc: ids of subscription options which will be applied to original price

docs.summary: calculates discounted price when specified subscription option applied for each of prices provided

params.name: price
params.doc: original price to which subscription options discount will be applied

params.name: ids
params.doc: ids of subscription options which will be applied to original price

docs.summary: calculates discounted price when specified subscription option applied to given price

params.name: subscriptionOption.id
params.doc: subscription option id (auto-generated upon subscription option creation)

events.name: Subscription Options Assignment Changed For Product Webhook

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: defines when subscriber will be charged: for frequency=MONTH, billingCycles=6, interval=2 payment will be done every 2 month during one year

members.name: description
members.doc: description (optional)

members.name: id
members.doc: subscription option id (auto-generated upon subscription option creation)

members.name: title
members.doc: title of subscription option

members.name: discount
members.doc: discount applied to item price when subscribing to it using this subscription option

members.name: type
members.doc: Discount type

members.name: value
members.doc: Discount value

members.name: frequency
members.doc: frequency of recurring payment

members.name: interval
members.doc: interval of recurring payment (optional: default value 1 will be used if not provided)

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: If true, subscription is auto renewed in the end of each period

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: how many billing cycles should be done before subscription finishes, considered only if autoRenewal is false

members.name: id
members.doc: Subscription option ID.

members.name: hidden
members.doc: Whether the subscription option is hidden for the product, (optional: default value is false).

messages.name: _wix_ecommerce_subscription_option_api_v1_SubscriptionOptionsAssignmentChangedForProduct
messages.displayName: Subscription Options Assignment Changed For Product Object

members.name: id
members.doc: Subscription option id

members.name: priceData
members.doc: Price data calculated for subscription option

members.name: convertedPriceData
members.doc: Price data calculated for subscription option, converted to the currency requested in request header

members.name: currency
members.doc: Subscription option price currency

members.name: discountedPrice
members.doc: Price calculated after subscription option discount applied

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Price calculated after subscription option discount applied, formatted with the currency

docs.summary:
Frequency unit of recurring payment Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • DAY
  • WEEK
  • MONTH
  • YEAR

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • AMOUNT - No discount
  • PERCENT
